posts.post_content:
Maybe I'm just an idiot, but this doesn't seem as worthless as all that. I don't know how much limited was really played in this card's time, but a 4 power regenerator is hard to attack into, so it would at least be useful defensively. It's also basically a hard-to-block 2-power attacker, which isn't exciting but certainly still relevant in limited. Also, any deck can cast it.  
  
Obviously useless in constructed, but there are plenty of worse cards.
